headline: KMB Stock Tumbles 19% in 3 Months: Buy the Dip or Stay Cautious?
summary: Kimberly-Clark slides 19% in three months as soft demand, currency pressure and heavy promotions weigh on margins and sentiment.

raw.headline: KMB Stock Tumbles 19% in 3 Months: Buy the Dip or Stay Cautious?

headline: What leadership changes mean for consumer brands like Coca-Cola
summary: Coca-Cola (KO) has named Henrique Braun to be the company's next CEO after current chief executive James Quincey steps down from the role at the end of March 2026. Braun is currently the EVP and Chief Operating Officer of The Coca‑Cola Company. A panel consisting of Northwestern Mutual Wealth Management Company CIO Brent Schutte and Yahoo Finance senior reporters Brooke DiPalma and Ines Ferré comment on the changing landscape for consumer brands as Coke becomes the latest company to be welcoming new CEOs. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.

headline: Laurent Nielly appointed as successor to CEO Gustavo Calvo Paz
summary: Inside / regulated information Aalst, Belgium, December 11, 2025 – The Board of Directors of Ontex (Euronext: ONTEX) has decided to appoint Mr. Laurent Nielly as Chief Executive Officer, effective as from the end of Mr. Gustavo Calvo Paz’s mandate as Chief Executive Officer at Ontex’s next annual shareholders’ meeting, on May 5, 2026. Since 2021, Mr. Nielly has been President of Ontex’s Europe Division, leading our retailer brands and healthcare business across Europe. Prior to that, Mr. Nielly

headline: 2 Dow Jones Stocks for Long-Term Investors and 1 We Find Risky
summary: The Dow Jones (^DJI) is home to corporate giants, but size alone doesn’t guarantee success. A few of these companies are struggling with weak fundamentals, paradigm shifts, or poor execution.
